name: Precision Paddle
description: Increases paddle control and accuracy for better ball direction.

name: Speed Boost
description: Temporarily increases ball speed for faster gameplay.

name: Multi-Ball
description: Splits the ball into multiple projectiles for increased coverage.

name: Shield
description: Protects against ball loss for a limited time.

name: Diamond Ball
description: Temporarily makes the ball break through any brick in one hit.

name: Lucky Drop
description: Increases the chance of power-up drops from broken bricks.
